    @allure.story("User1 create -> Admin activate -> User2 offer -> User1 sold -> Admin confirm")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    @pytest.mark.smoke
    def test_c2b_auction_full_flow(self, authenticated_api: ApiFacade):
        create_payload = {
            "core_car": {
                "services": [],
                "modification": 17580,
                "drive_unit": 1,

            "photos": [
                {

                },
                {
                    "url": "https://files-api.itpoint.uz/orient-motors/images/original/171a2479-d94b-464b-a746-33d1c791778e.jpg",
                    "thumbnail": "https://files-api.itpoint.uz/orient-motors/images/thumbnail/171a2479-d94b-464b-a746-33d1c791778e.jpg",
                    "type": "general",
                },
                {
                    "url": "https://files-api.itpoint.uz/orient-motors/images/original/6260d771-cf6f-4ddf-a5c2-435dffbd3ab1.jpg",
                    "thumbnail": "https://files-api.itpoint.uz/orient-motors/images/thumbnail/6260d771-cf6f-4ddf-a5c2-435dffbd3ab1.jpg",

            ],
            "changed_part": [],

            "passed_customs_clearance": False,
            "buy_it_now_price": 10000.0,
            "buy_it_now_currency": "usd",
        }
    
        with allure.step("User1: Create self-auction (POST /auction/self-auction)"):
            resp_create = authenticated_api.auction.create_self_auction(create_payload)
    
            allure.attach(json.dumps(create_payload, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2),
                          name="REQ Create Auction Payload", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.JSON)
            allure.attach(resp_create.text, name="RES Create Auction", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
